snippet: Former Olympic sprinter Frankie Fredericks has turned himself over to the IOC ethics commission following a French newspaper report linking him to a payment from a man who has been banned for life from track and field for corruption....

headline.main: Brazil's Tite Calls Up Uncapped Benfica Keeper Ederson
headline.print_headline: Brazil's Tite Calls Up Uncapped Benfica Keeper Ederson

lead_paragraph: Former Olympic sprinter Frankie Fredericks has turned himself over to the IOC ethics commission following a French newspaper report linking him to a payment from a man who has been banned for life from track and field for corruption.
